channel.title: Fucking shitholes
channel.description:
Why in hell do i have 0 rep for gods sake? just because i did a mistake it doesn't mean you can fuck my rep to "0"
FUCKING WARN ME BEFORE DOING IT YOU DEVIL ADMINISTRATOR YOU BEASTSHIT!

item.title: Fucking shitholes
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

When you registered, you had agreed you read the rules, if you don’t like it we don’t care.

Read full topic

item.title: Fucking shitholes
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Kingen50cent, post:7, topic:323563”][quote author=Rich link=topic=419967.msg3084843#msg3084843 date=1262439822]
who the fuck cares, it’s a number on a fucking forum, get over it
[/quote]
I Know But Why would he do it, i made a mistake, ok i won’t do it again & the topic got locked why in hell should the administrator reset![/quote]

Moderators can post in locked topics…

Read full topic

by the way, only administrators can reset reputation, so no, it wasn’t jme

item.title: Fucking shitholes
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

WHAT IN THE NAME OF HELL! IT IS THE FIRST SHIT TIME! I GAVE OLLIE REP JUST BECAUSE HE HELPED ME AND I DIDNT KNOW IT WAS AGAINST THE RULES THEN THIS DEVIL CAME AND RESETED MY FUCKING REP! DONT TELL ME YOU JUST LOST YOUR MIND OR HAVEN’T YOU READ MY TOPIC YET! THINK BEFORE YOU POST!

Read full topic

item.title: Fucking shitholes
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:839, topic:249774”][quote author=Kingen50cent link=topic=329269.msg3084835#msg3084835 date=1262439475]
I WANT TO COMPLAIN ABOUT THE DEVILSHIT JME WHO REMOVED MY REP AND RESTARTED IT!
YOU THICK BULBASAUR THING CAN’T YOU JUST FUCKING WARN ME BEFORE DOING IT!
[/quote]

See, this is a perfect example of why reputation is pointless. You were obviously abusing the system and therefore had your reputation reset, it’s not the first time. He doesn’t need to warn you as it’s clearly in the rules.[/quote]

Read full topic
